Chinese.name: CLS数据转存到Ckafka
Chinese.description: 本示例会将 CLS 的消息转存到一个 Ckafka topic 中。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关的环境变量给函数。

English.name: CLSToCkafka
English.description: This example CLS data and push these data to another kafka topic.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass some env variables to this function.
